name: JumpJump
description:
JumpJump is a very popular casual game that only requires pressing and releasing two actions. It is a simple gameplay, but it has a lot of difficulty. Compare who jumps farther and whose score is higher. Come and play!

Game gameplay

You need to jump to the next square! Click the mouse to control the jumping distance! How far can you jump up to?

Game Introduction

Refusing to be burdened with fun and not tired, the classic casual game "JumpJump" is coming with joy! Easy to operate and get started!

Jump Classic Version Game Features

Come and JumpJump together!

Press and release, hold and hold, then release.

Let's see how far you can jump!
